titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to convey a certain parcel of land located near Ocotillo, California.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committee.subcommittee: Public Lands, National Parks and Forests
committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources

bill.summary: 2/26/1987--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey, without consideration, to the Imperial Valley College Barker Museum of El Centro, California, specified lands near Ocotillo, California, for use as a museum. Reserves a right of reversion to the United States should such lands be used for other than public park, including museum, and recreational purposes.
